scripts.dev: node node_modules/rollup/bin/rollup src/client/main.js --o client/bundle.js --f iife && node node_modules/javascript-obfuscator/bin/javascript-obfuscator client/bundle.js --output client/bundle.js && node --max-old-space-size=8192 index
scripts.local: node node_modules/rollup/bin/rollup src/client/main.js --o client/bundle.js --f es && node --max-old-space-size=8192 index
